metadata.title: CVE-2024-42119 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Skip finding free audio for unknown engine_id[WHY]ENGINE_ID_UNKNOWN = -1 and can not be used as an array index. Plus, italso means it is uninitialized and does not need free audio.[HOW]Skip and return NULL.This fixes 2 OVERRUN issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
